lexUnit.name: rope.n

corpus.description: Wall Street Journal Texts from the PropBank Project
corpus.name: PropBank

lexUnit.definition: COD: a length of stout cord made by twisting together strands of hemp, sisal, nylon, etc.

sentence.text: ` Remember Joseph Buquet , and the rope around his neck ?

No one speaks , and the snaking of the ropes seems to make as much sound as the bells themselves , muffled by the ceiling .
